summary: Simple mod to remove all the ugly cobwebs from Fort Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Info:[/b][/u]
Isn't it a little strange that Fort Dawnguard, in all its fortified glory, is covered by enormous cobwebs? You'd think someone would pick up a broom in between hunting vampires. This mod aims to fix that by removing every single cobweb from inside Fort Dawnguard. That's it; nothing else is changed.

This is my first mod, and as such bear with me if I made a stupid mistake somewhere. It's simple enough I think everything should be OK, though.

[u][b]Compatability:[/b][/u]
The only Dawnguard mod I have installed is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30221/?]Dawnguard General Stores by Harvey2112[/url], and they work great together. There's a potential for conflict with any mod that changes Fort Dawguard's interior, but I don't think the removal of cobwebs should interfere with anything.

I'm using the latest patch, but I'm not sure that matters in this case.

[u][b]Updates:[/b][/u]
V2: cleaned in TES5Edit to ensure minimal conflicts.

[b][u]My Other Mods:[/u][/b]

author: GyntRyles
